frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-autohide-volume
frozen.longDescription:
Autohide volume indicator when muted

I'm not interested in the fact my output audio device is muted: this is how it's supposed to be. But if it's unmuted, then I want to see the icon.

Except when the mic is on, then I'm probably in a call, frantically figuring out what's wrong.
